description: This is a Gradle build script written in Kotlin DSL for configuring an Android application project with Flutter integration. It specifies plugins, Android build parameters, compile options, default configurations, build types, and Flutter source settings.

methods.name: plugins { ... }
methods.description: Defines the plugins used in the build configuration, such as Android application, Kotlin Android, and Flutter Gradle plugin.

methods.name: android { ... }
methods.description: Configures Android build parameters including namespace, SDK versions, compile options, Kotlin options, default app config, and build types.

methods.name: flutter { ... }
methods.description: Specifies the source directory for Flutter assets and code integration.
